item.title: インドのストリーミングサービスJioCinemaは、100以上の映画やテレビシリーズを追加し、コンテンツに課金する計画だ。JioCinemaは4月12日のIPLクリケットの試合で22Mの視聴者がいた（P R Sanjai/Bloomberg）
item.description:
P R Sanjai / Bloomberg:
Indian streaming service JioCinema plans to add 100+ films and TV series and charge for content; JioCinema had 22M viewers for an IPL cricket match on April 12  —  Billionaire Mukesh Ambani's streaming service will add more than 100 films and TV series to its platform, building on the popularity …

item.title: エルサルバドルのエルファロ、ニュースルームを除くほとんどの業務をコスタリカに移し、非営利団体として登録、ブケレ政府の攻撃に直面したと発表（アルジャジーラ）。
item.description:
Al Jazeera:
El Salvador's El Faro moves most operations, except its newsroom, to Costa Rica and registers as a non-profit, saying it faced Bukele government attacks  —  The Salvadoran news outlet El Faro says the Bukele government has attacked the country's press and eroded rule of law.

item.title: テキサス州ラノ郡当局は、検閲の取り組みを暴露する全国メディアからの圧力を感じた後、図書館閉鎖と図書禁止から手を引いた（ワシントンポスト）。
item.description:
Washington Post:
Rural Llano County officials in Texas backed away from library closures and book bans, after feeling pressure from national media exposing censorship efforts  —  It isn't every day that the ruminations of local bureaucrats in a small rural Texas county become national news.

item.title: モンタナ州議員、2024年1月1日からTikTokを禁止し、アプリストアが州内でアプリを提供することを禁止する初の法案を承認（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Montana lawmakers approve a first-of-its-kind bill that bans TikTok and bars app stores from offering the app within the state, starting on January 1, 2024  —  Supporters of the first-of-its-kind-bill expect legal challenges if the governor signs the legislation

item.title: 韓国の映画やテレビ番組の海賊版プラットフォーム「Noonoo TV」が閉鎖、高い帯域幅料金と「圧力」のせい、新たな反海賊版連合からだろう (Andy Maxwell/TorrentFreak)
item.description:
Andy Maxwell / TorrentFreak:
Noonoo TV, a South Korean movie and TV show piracy platform, shuts down, blaming high bandwidth charges and “pressure”, likely from a new anti-piracy coalition  —  One month ago, South Korean movie and TV show piracy platform Noonoo TV was riding the crest of a wave along with tens of millions of dedicated fans.

item.title: CoinDesk、生成AI画像の使用中止を計画、異なる文脈でのAI使用のルールを明記、記事には開示を求めるが見出しは不可（Pete Pachal/CoinDesk）
item.description:
Pete Pachal / CoinDesk:
CoinDesk plans to stop using generative AI images and spells out its rules for AI use in different contexts, requiring disclosure for articles but not headlines  —  Artificial intelligence (AI) tools are changing the way we work - especially the media.  Here are the rules of the road for CoinDesk.

item.title: Dotdash Meredithが5月1日付けでSally HolmesをInStyleの編集長兼ゼネラルマネージャーに任命、Holmesは2020年からMarie Claireの編集長を務めていた（Freya Drohan/Daily Front Row）
item.description:
Freya Drohan / Daily Front Row:
Dotdash Meredith names Sally Holmes editor-in-chief and general manager of InStyle, effective May 1; Holmes has been Marie Claire's editor-in-chief since 2020  —  Dotdash Meredith has announced that Sally Holmes will assume the role of editor in chief and general manager of InStyle, effective May 1.

item.title: 米国はベトナムに対し、反国家活動で12日に懲役6年の判決を受けたブロガーでラジオ・フリー・アジアの寄稿者であるグエン・ラン・タンの釈放を指示した（John Boudreau/Bloomberg）
item.description:
John Boudreau / Bloomberg:
The US tells Vietnam to release blogger and Radio Free Asia contributor Nguyen Lan Thang, sentenced on April 12 to six years in prison for anti-state activities  —  The US called on Vietnam to release blogger Nguyen Lan Thang who was sentenced to six years in prison Wednesday …

item.title: Taboolaとオープンマーケットプログラマティック広告を削減して以来、Bloombergはこれらの広告主を、過去数ヶ月間に〜7.4Mドル相当の自社プロモに置き換えている（Ryan Barwick/Marketing Brew）。
item.description:
Ryan Barwick / Marketing Brew:
Since cutting Taboola and open-market programmatic ads, Bloomberg has replaced those advertisers with in-house promos worth ~$7.4M over the past few months  —  Spring cleaning came early for Bloomberg Media.  Last fall, the publisher said it would cut ties with the programmatic open marketplace …

item.title: 英国のメディア企業33社を対象とした調査：男女の給与格差の平均中央値は2017年の15.7％から2022年には12.1％に、平均値は17.7％から13.7％に低下（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）．
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
A study of 33 UK media companies: the average median gender pay gap fell from 15.7% in 2017 to 12.1% in 2022 and the average mean gap fell from 17.7% to 13.7%  —  There are more men than women in the top-paid quartile at 91% of major UK media companies.  —  Men were paid more on average …

item.title: Instagram、トレンドの音声やハッシュタグのセクションを備えたReelsをアップデート、ギフトをより多くの国に拡大、編集ツールを強化、新しいメトリクスを追加など（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Instagram updates Reels with a section for trending audio and hashtags, expands gifts to more countries, enhances its editing tools, adds new metrics, and more  —  As governments around the world express growing concerns about TikTok, its rival Instagram Reels is getting a series of new updates aimed at creators.

item.title: スコラスティック社、児童書作家に対し、現在進行中の人種差別に関する著者注の文言を削除するよう求めたことについて、読者層の減少を招く恐れがあるとして謝罪 (Publishers Weekly)
item.description:
Publishers Weekly:
Scholastic apologizes for asking a children's book author to cut language in an author's note about ongoing racism after saying the note might lessen readership  —  Concerns about censorship at Scholastic's Rising Voices Library, a diversity-focused provider of educational materials …

item.title: Spotifyは、2022年7月にWordleをモチーフにした音楽当てゲームを買収した後、5月5日にHeardleを閉鎖し、他の音楽発見の目的に集中する予定だ（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Spotify plans to shut down Heardle on May 5, after acquiring the Wordle-inspired music guessing game in July 2022, to focus on other music discovery objectives  —  Spotify is closing down Heardle, the Wordle-inspired music guessing game it acquired last July for an undisclosed sum.

item.title: ComcastがJames MurdochとUday ShankarのBodhi Tree Systemsに$200Mを投資、この資金でインドのメディアグループViacom18の少数株を購入する予定 (Patrick Frater/Variety)
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
Comcast invests $200M in James Murdoch and Uday Shankar's Bodhi Tree Systems, which will use the money to buy a minority stake in Indian media group Viacom18  —  Comcast, the conglomerate behind NBCUniversal and the Sky European TV giant, is to invest $200 million in Bodhi Tree Systems …

item.title: 情報源: 欧州議会は、チャットボットメーカーが著作物を使用しているかどうかを明らかにすることを強制するなど、AIに関する厳しい新措置の最終決定に近づいている（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: the European parliament is close to finalizing tough new measures on AI, including forcing chatbot makers to reveal if they use copyrighted material  —  Proposals include requiring chatbot makers to reveal if they are using copyrighted material  —  The European parliament …
